debates.showAs: Pregnancy Loss (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2025: Second Stage
Pregnancy Loss (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave consequent upon the loss of a pregnancy and for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997, to extend the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015, and to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other Acts. Furthermore, an Act to provide for matters including the establishment of a register relating to the record of pregnancy loss and the maintenance of this opt-in register of pregnancy loss, which shall be closed to searching by members of the public.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá de dhroim toircheas a chailliúint agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997, do leathnú na cosanta ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar Achtanna áirithe eile. Ina theannta sin, Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le nithe lena n-áirítear clár a bhaineann leis an taifead ar chailliúint toirchis a bhunú agus an clár roghnach sin um chailliúint toirchis a chothabháil, ar clár é a bheidh dúnta ar chuardach ag daoine den phobal.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chailliúint Toirchis (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for prohibiting discrimination on the basis of a person’s socio-economic disadvantaged background, for those purposes to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 and the Equal Status Act 2000; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toirmeasc a chur le hidirdhealú ar bhonn cúlra socheacnamaíoch faoi mhíbhuntáiste a bheith ag duine, chun na gcríoch sin do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Responsibility of Social Media Platforms (Defamation Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law relating to defamation, in order to allow judgements of defamation be made against the social media platform on which the defamatory utterances were made when the social media platform in question is unable to produce the identity of the person who made the utterances, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le clúmhilleadh, chun go bhféadfar breithiúnais chlúmhillte a thabhairt i gcoinne an ardáin meán sóisialta a ndearnadh an chaint chlúmhillteach air nuair nach mbeidh an t-ardán meán sóisialta a bheidh i gceist in ann céannacht an duine a rinne an chaint a thabhairt ar aird, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Responsibility of Social Media Platforms (Defamation Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhreagracht Ardán Meán Sóisialta (Leasú ar Dhlí an Chlúmhillte), 2022

debates.showAs: Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Education Act 1998 to grant additional functions to the Inspectorate to examine and report to the Minister on the prevalence and standard of individual educational plans for children with special educational needs on an annual basis; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998 chun feidhmeanna breise a thabhairt don Chigireacht maidir le scrúdú a dhéanamh ar leathadúlacht agus caighdeán pleananna oideachais aonair le haghaidh leanaí a bhfuil riachtanais oideachais speisialta acu agus tuairisciú a dhéanamh ar an gcéanna don Aire ar bhonn bliantúil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Education (Inspection of Individual Education Plans for Children with Special Needs) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Iniúchadh ar Phleananna Oideachais Aonair le haghaidh Leanaí a bhfuil Riachtanais Speisialta acu), 2022

debates.showAs: Housing (Adaptation Grant for People with a Disability) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Housing (Adaptation Grant for People with a Disability) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Housing (Adaptation Grant for People with a Disability) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for ease of access to a housing adaptation grant for people with a disability for those applicants qualifying for same and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rochtain ar dheontas oiriúnaithe tithíochta do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas a bheith ar fáil go héasca ag na hiarratasóirí sin a cháilíonn don chéanna, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Housing (Adaptation Grant for People with a Disability) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na dTithe (Deontas Oiriúnaithe do Dhaoine faoi Mhíchumas), 2021
